Package game.dinosaur

Class Dinosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaur.Dinosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Allosaur, Brachiosaur, Pterodactyl, Stegosaur
public abstract class Dinosaur
extends Actor
An abstract class that represents a dinosaur.

      Parameters:
      name - the name of this dinosaur
      displayChar - the character to represent this dinosaur in the display
      hitPoints - the starting hit points of this dinosaur
      sex - the sex of this dinosaur

      public boolean isConscious()

      Overrides:
      isConscious in class Actor

    • distance

      private int distance​(Location a, Location b)
      Compute the Manhattan distance between two locations.
      Parameters:
      a - the first location
      b - the second location
      Returns:
      the number of steps between a and b if you only move in the four cardinal directions
